member.name: M:BB.Comparer.Business.TextDiff.CompareText_Indices(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Compares two sentences by word and returns the commonalities.
member.param: choose whether to ignore the case of the strings a and b.
member.returns: A dictionary where the keys are indices (a, b) and the values are the lengths of the commonalities.
